query:
UPDATE systems
        SET completion = CASE
        WHEN NOT EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM games
            WHERE games.system_id = systems.id
            AND games.completion != 2
            AND games.sorting != 2
        ) THEN 2
        WHEN NOT EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM games
            WHERE games.system_id = systems.id
            AND games.completion != 0
            AND games.sorting != 2
        ) THEN 0
        ELSE 1
        END
        WHERE id = ?
